CLASS.name: UNFRACTIONATED HEPARIN (CURATIVE DOSES AND/OR OLDER PATIENTS)

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the risk of hemorrhage (inhibition of the platelet function and irritation of the gastroduodenal mucosa by the acetylsalicylic acid)
INTERACTION.COMMENT: -anti-inflammatory doses of acetylsalicylic acid (>=1gr per dose and/or >=3 gr per day)
